tool.name: Run CellProfiler
tool.command:
export MPLCONFIGDIR=\$TEMP && export HOME=\$PWD &&
mkdir -p ./home ./home/output ./home/input && chown -R 1000:1000 ./home && #for $i,$filename in enumerate($infiles): ln -s '$filename' './home/input/${filename.element_identifier}.${filename.ext}' && #end for
#if str($input_type.existing) == "existing": cp '${input_type.pipeline_file}' \$HOME/home/output/'$input_type.pipeline_file.element_identifier'.cppipe && echo "cellprofiler -r --pipeline \$HOME/home/output/'$input_type.pipeline_file.element_identifier'.cppipe -i \$HOME/home/input -o \$HOME/home/output " > \$HOME/home/cellprofiler_galaxy && chmod +x \$HOME/home/cellprofiler_galaxy && cp \$HOME/home/cellprofiler_galaxy '/bin' && #end if
/init

param.name: existing
param.label: Do you have an existing pipeline?
